name: Prototyper
description:
Generate fully navigable gamepad and keyboard prototypes in seconds with Prototyper.


Choose from many navigation presets (D-Pad, LS, RS, Arrow Keys, etc.), create custom binds, add transitions, automatically move navigation focus with variants and more. Prototyper completely automates the most tedious parts of creating prototypes.


Get started with a quick overview.


Generate Prototypes

Generate a prototype to navigate an entire screen of your design. Select the component instances you'd like to navigate in your screen and click Generate. Prototyper will automatically create all intermediate navigation frames and interactions for your prototype.


Link Frames

Connect multiple screens of your design into a prototype. Select all the screens you'd like to navigate and click Link. Prototyper will automatically create interactions between your screens.


Positioning Your Layers

Prototyper determines the direction of navigation based on how your design elements are arranged. For example: if you design elements are in a square grid, then Prototyper will assign up, down, left and right navigation to the neighbors of each element.


Therefore, for best results, always arrange your component instances and frames how you'd like to navigate them.


Supported Devices

Keyboard and Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Switch Pro controllers.


Open Source

Prototyper is open source and contributions are welcome!
